Task 2 (3 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 2: 5 minutes

You need to search online to find office space for rental in Leeds, UK.

Click on the Task 2 Evidence button below to download the Task 2 Evidence Document and save a copy of this file in the Section 1 subfolder you created.

a) Use the Internet to search for office rental space in Leeds, UK.

Paste a screenshot of you search terms and results into your Task 2 Evidence Document. (1 mark)

b) Select a suitable website from your results. The website you select must not be an advert or sponsored site. Paste a screenshot of the search results showing this website. (1 mark)

c) Go to the website and find the address and a map showing the location of the rental space. Capture the information on one or more screenshots. (1 mark)

Paste your screenshot(s) into your Task 2 Evidence Document.

Save your finished Task 2 Evidence Document.

Upload your finished Task 2 Evidence Document by using the Upload button below.

When you have finished Task 2 press Next.

Task 2 Evidence
